style_descriptors.name: Ceramic & White
style_descriptors.description: Clean, minimalist aesthetic with ceramic and plastic surfaces. Dominated by whites and light greys with smooth, uncluttered lines. Evokes medical/scientific environments.

style_descriptors.name: Metal & Grated
style_descriptors.description: Heavy industrial aesthetic with exposed metal grating, riveted panels, and visible structural elements. Shows wear and tear with rust spots and scratched surfaces.

style_descriptors.name: Minimalist Composite
style_descriptors.description: Ultra-modern minimalist design using advanced composite materials. Dark, sleek surfaces with precision engineering. Every element serves a purpose with no ornamentation.

style_descriptors.name: High-Tech Clean
style_descriptors.description: Cutting-edge technology aesthetic with polished surfaces, integrated displays, and ambient lighting. Bright, clean spaces with holographic interfaces and seamless panels.

style_descriptors.name: Lived-In Utility
style_descriptors.description: Functional spaces showing years of use. Patched panels, personal modifications, worn surfaces. Equipment maintained but showing age. Feels like a working ship, not a showroom.

style_descriptors.name: Organic Bio-Tech
style_descriptors.description: Alien bio-engineered ship with grown rather than built components. Curved, organic surfaces that pulse and breathe. Bioluminescent accents. Deeply unsettling to human sensibilities.
